snippet: Finland staged a late comeback with three goals in the third period of a 4-3 win at the world junior hockey championship. The United States beat Sweden, 8-3, for the bronze.
abstract: Finland beats Russia, 4-3, to win gold medal at world junior hockey championship in Helsinki.
lead_paragraph: Finland staged a late comeback with three goals in the third period of a 4-3 win at the world junior hockey championship. The United States beat Sweden, 8-3, for the bronze.

headline.main: Finland Rallies Past Russia for Juniors Title
headline.print_headline: Finland Rallies Past Russia for Title
